column1: #Text=Polycrystalline samples of LiGa0.2In0.8Cr4O8 were synthesized by a solid-state reaction method.
#Text=Stoichiometric amounts of Li2CO3, Cr2O3, Ga2O3, and In2O3 were mixed in a 1:4:0.2:0.8 molar ratio and thoroughly ground in a mortar.
#Text=The mixture was pelletized and sintered at 800 °C in the air for 12 h.
#Text=The substance was ground, pressured into pellets, and finally sintered at 1000 °C for 24 h and 1100 °C for 72 h.
#Text=We checked the quality of the samples by X-ray diffraction measurements.
